text: gen tte yaru ga ī. `Ten to ji no omo wa daredearu no ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā de ara reru.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa kare no soto ni, jibun jishin ni sae-eki mo gai mo motarasenai mono-tachi o hogo-sha to suru no ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Mōjin to seigan-sha wa onajidearu no ka. Mata ankoku to kōmyō to wa onajidearu no ka. Kare-ra wa arrā ga sōzō sa reta yōna tsukura reta mono o, kare to dōi ni haisuru. Sore de kare-ra ni wa sōzō no imi ga utagawashiku natta no ka.'
